A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film goes to show that reviews can be bought and Disney is now the real-life Galactic Empire of filmmaking. How critics rated this movie brilliant baffles me. The only emotions this film delivers is one of heartbreak and shock at what is being portrayed on screen. It's a slap in the face for all Star Wars fans intelligent enough to know a PC movie whenever the see one. THIS MOVIE SUCKED.
